name: Denda Games
tag_list: dendagames, denda, denda-games, zoek-en-vind-spelletjes, avontuur-spelletjes, 3-op-een-rij-spelletjes, time-management-spelletjes, strategie-spelletjes, puzzel-spelletjes
overview:
About Denda Games: Denda Games is publisher of a wide range of “casual games” and focuses on publishing games on CD ROMs and games for the Nintendo DS in the Benelux retail channel. The company also has a strong focus on expanding its website www.denda.com which every day is a new downloadable game will appear and the total supply has now grown to over 350 games.

Denda Games was founded in 2007 by Jacques Neuvel and owes its present position on good relationships and alliances that it has achieved the leading developers and publishers of casual games in the world. The agreements and joint ventures are all focused on the long term. The main features of the company are introducing high-quality localized (Dutch) products, providing the most extensive and varied range, delivering the best possible support to the customer and providing the newest, most popular games on the consumers in the Benelux.

relationships.title: Head of Marketing and Public Relations
